Class Person

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • Person
  • public class Person
extends greenfoot.Actor
    Lift simulation: Person will be set on floor (via constructir), moves to lift or leaves floor.
    Version:
  • V0.1 (Beta),
  • V0.2 17.12.2017 Status LEAVE_FLOOR added,
  • V0.3 18.12.2017 Error status-call solved,
  • V0.4 18.12.2017 old Version,
  • V0.5 21.08.2017 Refactoring,
  • V0.6 06.12.2018 Some enhancements / comments added,
  • V0.7 08.12.2020 Fix error: Numbers on floor on exit! >> currentFloorNr deleted!
    • Author:
    KEL
